name: Lord of Throne
description:
Become the lord of your throne. Earn poops, buy upgrades, unlock new thrones, and attract powerful followers to your cause!

Can you earn 1 million poops? 1 billion? 1 TRILLION?

FEATURES

Tap to earn poops

Use poops to buy upgrades and earn even more poops

Powerful followers and acolytes help to earn valuable gold turds

Customise what you flush

Prestige! Progress through prestige levels, each time unlocking a new throne

Realistic sound effects

Choose to play at 30 or 60 frames per second, for battery saving or smooth flowing visuals

No in-app purchases

Unobtrusive ads

Can be played offline

WHAT'S NEW

Big thankyou to everyone who got in contact to report bugs and make suggestions!

Changelist:

- Leaderboards! Become the Richest Golden Lord by competing on the new leaderboard. Whoever has the most Gold Turds at any one time will become the Richest Golden Lord

- Upgrade maximums have increased to 100

- Acolyte Power now maxes at 50 Gold Turds and the price multiplier has been reduced

- Prestige description (hopefully) makes more sense

- + minor bug fixes

PERMISSIONS

Game requires internet access for ad support only

Ridiculous, funny, and a little satirical, Lord of Throne is a creation of the mobile game developer Hyper Laser. For feedback, bug reports, discussion, and suggestions, please contact us.
